channel.title: Functions on Andrea Cirillo
channel.description: Recent content in Functions on Andrea Cirillo

item.title: excel right() function in R
item.description: as part of the** excel functions in R,** I have developed this custom function, reproducing the excel right() function in th R language. Feel free to copy and use it. [code language=“r”] right = function (string, char){ substr(string,nchar(string)-(char-1),nchar(string))} [/code] you can find other function in the Excel functions in R post.

item.title: excel left() function in R
item.description: as part of the excel functions in R, I have developed this custom function, emulating the excel left() function in th R language. Feel free to copy and use it. left = function (string,char){ substr(string,1,char)} you can find other function in theExcel functions in R post.
